Body:
for create, status_code in [(True, 201), (False, 403)]:
    response = self.app.post('/roles', headers=self.headers, data=json.
        dumps({'email': self.read_user['email'], 'api': self.api, 'roles':
        {'create': create}}), content_type='application/json')
    self.assertEqual(response.status_code, 204)
    response = self.app.post('/%s/movies' % self.api, headers=self.
        read_user_header, data=json.dumps({}), content_type='application/json')
    self.assertEqual(response.status_code, status_code)
